message: Let's split the money fairly. I'll take 75% and you'll get 25%. It's a fair deal.
I think a 60/40 split is more fair. It's still a good deal for both of us, and I'm willing to take the risk of going to the next round.
Considering the inflation, I propose a 60/40 split. This maintains fairness while accounting for the decrease in value of the money.
